sentences.en: .He is one of the best tenor sax players ever.
sentences.cn: 他是有史以来最出色的次中音萨克斯管演奏者之一。

sentences.en: Arthur Davies sings the tenor solo.
sentences.cn: 阿瑟•戴维斯表演男高音独唱。

sentences.en: He suggested that many of the ideas just would not work. But the tenor of his input was "Right on! Please show us how to make them work".
sentences.cn: 他认为这些想法有很多根本就不会奏效。但是他说话的大意却是“好极了！请告诉我们怎么让它们见效”。

sentences.en: He's generally considered to have the finest tenor voice in the country.
sentences.cn: 现在 公认他是该国最佳的男高音歌手.

sentences.en: Her dreams were troubled, reflecting the tenor of her waking hours.
sentences.cn: 她在梦中焦虑不安，反映了她白天生活的基调。

sentences.en: I understood the tenor of his speech but not the details.
sentences.cn: 我懂得他讲话的大意,但不懂其中的细节.

sentences.en: I was encouraged by the general tenor of his remarks.
sentences.cn: 他话中的要点使我深受鼓舞。

sentences.en: The four parts in singing are soprano, alto, tenor and bass.
sentences.cn: 唱歌的四个声部是女高音 、 女低音 、 男高音和男低音.

sentences.en: The tenor of his speech was that war would come.
sentences.cn: 他讲话的大意是战争将要发生.

sentences.en: The tenor of the opening remarks reflects the divergence in the priorities of the two sides.
sentences.cn: 开场白的要旨反映了双方在何为当务之急上存在分歧。

sentences.en: The tenor was a pupil of a singer.
sentences.cn: 这位男高音歌手师承一位歌唱家.

sentences.en: The whole tenor of discussions has changed.
The whole tenor of the meeting was very positive.
sentences.cn: 会议的整体氛围很积极.

sentences.en: This small part was taken with elan by a promising young tenor.
sentences.cn: 这一小段由一位大有前途的青年男高音倾情演绎。

sentences.en: This song is too low for a tenor.
sentences.cn: 这首歌让男高音歌手唱音太低了.

sentences.en: We persuaded Jake to sing tenor.
sentences.cn: 我们说服杰克唱男高音.

words.tran_cn: 唱次中音者；男高音歌手
男高音；要旨，大意；[金融]票据的限期；稳定的进程

trans.tran_en: a tenor voice or instrument has a range of notes that is lower than an  alto  voice or instrument

trans.tran_cn: 稳定的进程，要旨，男高音，票据的限期
trans.tran_en: a male singing voice that can reach the range of notes below the lowest woman’s voice, or a man with a voice like this
